Text: "The Return of the Son of Monster Magnet" is a Frank Zappa composition, performed by The Mothers of Invention, released on the Mothers' debut album, "Freak Out!

--------------------
Text: The Return of the Son of Monster Magnet:  The composition includes a musical quote from "Louie Louie" (Richard Berry).
Triplets:<The Return of the Son of Monster Magnet
4:
--------------------
Text: The Return of the Son of Monster Magnet:  The Monster Magnet, which almost certainly inspired the song's title, was a toy magnet in the shape of a monster, then being heavily advertised on television.
